name: Double or Nothing
description: You roll across empty desert in your machine built for suffering. Ahead, a decision. You'll hit one group, that obvious; but who? One or two. You can kill one, or you can kill two -- its your decision. In the wasteland only blood rules.

options.name: One wastelander.
options.description: One lone nomad; they've survived so much to get here. You could end them.

options.name: Two survivors.
options.description: The apocalypse took many victims; but somehow, these two survived; two lovers in an empty ocean of anguish. Not for long.
